# The `TempFile` Class Reference

## Description {#details}

A RAII object that creates a file upon initialization and removes it upon destruction.

Definition at line 203 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/testing/include/llvm/testing/support/supporthelpers-h">SupportHelpers.h</a>.

## Public Constructors

### TempFile() {#a2277a37b366e2d68164f1ab32bb26dca}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>llvm::unittest::TempFile::TempFile (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> Name, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> Suffix=&quot;&quot;, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> Contents=&quot;&quot;, bool Unique=false)</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Creates a managed file.

<ParametersList title="Parameters">
<ParametersListItem name="Name">The name of the file to create.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="Contents">The string to write to the file.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="Unique">If true, the file will be created using <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/fs/#ab15b20ec21b28d9674608fd5aecc64de">llvm::sys::fs::createTemporaryFile</a>.</ParametersListItem>
</ParametersList>
